text: The École de l'air et de l'Espace is a military school and grande école training line officers in the French Air Force. It is located at Salon-de- Provence Air Base in Salon-de-Provence, France. == Degrees == Its different curricula lead to the following French & European degrees: * Ingénieur École de l'air (École de l'air Graduate engineer Masters level program) ; * Mastères Spécialisés (In partnership with the French Civil Aviation University and the Institut supérieur de l'aéronautique et de l'espace. * Massive Online Open Course in air defense. Un cours de l'école de l'Air en ligne. Compréhension de l'arme aérienne It trains fighter pilots, military engineers and technicians. == Famous former students == * Caroline Aigle, French fighter pilot. Le dernier envol de l'aigle Hommage rendu au commandant Caroline Aigle (94) * Michel Tognini, French test pilot, astronaut, educator, writer and administrator. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:1933 establishments in France Category:Military schools Category:Grandes Ecoles
title: École de l'air et de l'espace
